content.body: annevk: if there somewhere I can read about the current state of ITP in Safari? Eg double-keying and cookie lifetimes in various contexts (eg iframes, different kinds of popups, the kinds of interactions that change the behaviour)

content.body: Jake Archibald: suspect https://webkit.org/blog/category/privacy/ is your best bet as far as webkit.org goes, not sure about outside documentation

content.body: annevk: hmm, I see stuff like https://webkit.org/blog/9521/intelligent-tracking-prevention-2-3/, but that's just a changelog as far as I can tell. Is it expected that folks go through all these changelogs and manually figure out how it works today, or is that documented somewhere else?

content.body: https://webkit.org/tracking-prevention/ I believe should be what you want?
